snippet: Tesla departed from the auto show pattern of announcing upbeat news and defended its reputation on safety after announcing a recall on wall chargers.
abstract: Tesla Motors, at the North American International Auto Show, departs from show pattern of announcing upbeat news and defends its reputation on safety after announcing a recall on wall chargers.
lead_paragraph: Tesla departed from the auto show pattern of announcing upbeat news and defended its reputation on safety after announcing a recall on wall chargers.

headline.main: At Auto Show, Tesla Defends Safety Record
headline.print_headline: At Auto Show, Tesla Defends Safety Record
